explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the use of Acoustic Emission (AE) technology for Structural Health Monitoring (SHM) of marine renewable energy devices, specifically wave energy converters. It discusses the application of AE monitoring in underwater environments and its potential for early fault detection and maintenance planning. The paper does not mention any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models, nor does it involve any of the listed keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or large language models.
